name: JLPT N4 Meaning Quiz
instructions: Choose the number of the most correct meaning!

cards.question: いただく
answer: to receive, to take food or drink (hum)

cards.question: 一生懸命 (いっしょうけんめい)
answer: as well as one can, with utmost effort

cards.question: いらっしゃる
answer: (hon) to be, to come, to go

cards.question: 遅れる (おくれる)
answer: to be late, to be delayed

cards.question: 行う
answer: to perform, to do, to carry out

cards.question: 怒る (おこる)
answer: to get angry, to be angry

cards.question: お嬢さん (おじょうさん)
驚く (おどろく)
answer: to be surprised, to be astonished

cards.question: お見舞い (おみまい)
answer: calling on someone who is ill, enquiry

cards.question: 下りる
answer: to descend a mountain, to (descend) go down stairs

cards.question: おる
answer: to be (polite version of いる)

cards.question: 折る (おる)
answer: to break, to fold, to pick a flower

cards.question: 折れる (おれる)
answer: to break, to be folded, to give in, to turn (a corner)

cards.question: 会場
answer: assembly hall, meeting place, the grounds

cards.question: 変える (かえる)
answer: to change, to alter, to vary

cards.question: 掛ける (かける)
answer: to hang, to put on (eg wall)

cards.question: 飾る (かざる)
answer: to decorate, to ornament, to adorn

cards.question: ガソリンスタンド
answer: gasoline stand, gas station, petrol station

cards.question: 片付ける (かたづける)
answer: to tidy up, to put in order, to put away

cards.question: 通う
answer: (1) to go back and forth, (2) to commute

cards.question: 変わる (かわる)
answer: to change, to be transformed, to vary

cards.question: 頑張る (がんばる)
answer: to try one's best, to persist

cards.question: 聞こえる
answer: to be heard, to be audible

cards.question: 決る (きまる)
answer: to be decided, to be settled

cards.question: 暮れる (くれる)
answer: to get dark, to come to an end

cards.question: 高校/高等学校 (こうこう/こうとうがっこう)
こっち
answer: (1) this person, (2) this direction, (3) this side, (4) thereafter

cards.question: コンピュータ/コンピューター
探す (さがす)
answer: to search, to seek, to look for

cards.question: 下げる
answer: to hang, to lower, to move back

cards.question: 差し上げる (さしあげる)
騒ぐ (さわぐ)
answer: to make noise, to clamor, to be excited

cards.question: 出席 (しゅっせき・する)
招待 (しょうたい・する)
凄い (すごい)
answer: terrific, amazing, to a great extent

cards.question: 進む
answer: to make progress, to advance, to proceed

cards.question: ずっと
answer: straight, quickly, all of a sudden

cards.question: 育てる (そだてる)
answer: to raise, to rear, to bring up

cards.question: そんな
answer: such, like that, that sort of

cards.question: 足す
answer: to add (numbers), to do (eg. one's business)

cards.question: 足りる
answer: to be sufficient, to be enough

cards.question: 中学校
answer: junior high school, middle school pupil

cards.question: 駐車場 (ちゅうしゃじょう)
捕まえる (つかまえる)
answer: to catch, to arrest, to seize

cards.question: 点く (つく)
answer: to be started, to be switched on

cards.question: 漬ける (つける)
answer: to soak, to moisten, to pickle

cards.question: 続ける (つづける)
answer: to continue, to keep up, to keep on

cards.question: できるだけ
answer: if at all possible, as much as possible

cards.question: 手伝う (てつだう)
answer: to help, to assist, to take part in

cards.question: 天気予報 (てんきよほう)
途中 (とちゅう)
answer: on the way, en route, midway

cards.question: 特急
answer: limited express (train, faster than an express)

cards.question: 取り替える (とりかえる)
直る (なおる)
answer: to be fixed, to be repaired

cards.question: 鳴る (なる)
answer: to sound, to ring, to resound

cards.question: 入学
answer: entry to school or university, matriculation

cards.question: 乗り換える (のりかえる)
パート（タイム）
answer: part time (esp female part time employees)

cards.question: ～始める
answer: to start doing　～, the beginning of ～

cards.question: 恥ずかしい (はずかしい)
冷える (ひえる)
answer: to grow cold, to get chilly, to cool down

cards.question: 昼休み
answer: lunch break, noon recess, noon rest period

cards.question: 拾う (ひろう)
answer: to pick up, to find, to gather

cards.question: 普通 (ふつう)
answer: (1) generally, ordinarily, usually, (2) train that stops at every station

cards.question: 太る
answer: to grow fat (stout, plump), to become fat

cards.question: 踏む (ふむ)
answer: to step on, to tread on

cards.question: 間違える (まちがえる)
answer: to err, to make a mistake

cards.question: 見える
answer: to be seen, to be in sight

cards.question: 見つかる
answer: (uk) to be found, to be discovered

cards.question: 召し上がる (めしあがる)
申し上げる (もうしあげる)
役に立つ (やくにたつ)
answer: to be helpful, to be useful

cards.question: 焼ける (やける)
answer: to burn, to be roasted, to be sunburnt

cards.question: やせる
answer: to become thin, to lose weight

cards.question: 汚れる (よごれる)
answer: to get dirty, to become dirty

cards.question: 喜ぶ (よろこぶ)
answer: to be delighted, to be glad

cards.question: 別れる
answer: to be divided, to part from, to separate

cards.question: 沸く (わく)
answer: to boil, to grow hot, to get excited
